name: Giana Sisters: Twisted Dreams

files.humblebundleinstaller: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by Humble

content:
files:
- humblebundleinstaller: N/A:Select the Windows installer provided by Humble
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Giana Sisters - Twisted Dreams/launcher/GSLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005 vcrun2010 xact wmp10
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: dotnet40 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: humblebundleinstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
